text: Joseph Crozier (4 December 1889 – 1960) was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half. ==References== Category:1869 births Category:1960 deaths Category:People from Middlesbrough Category:English footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Middlesbrough F.C. players Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Joe Crozier (footballer, born 1889)
